comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Could be this guy: www.garrisonlogan.org/getperson.php?personID=I13181&t... and www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=82099028 If so, he survived the war and had 16 children by two wives. He was born in Georgia but both marriages were in Rusk Co., Texas. He died in 1922 in Overton, Rusk Co., Texas
